page.title: 16FLOODING
page.content: It was a Friday afternoon in December and we were all at school. It was raining very fast and it seemed as if it would never stop. The playground was like a lake and Lawefield Lane was also flooded and running like a river. About 2 o'clock it was so bad that people were ringing home for their parents to come and collect them because the water was rising rapidly. I didn't get home until after 3 o'clock and I was soaked. When I saw our house I was very upset. The water had got in and it was a foot deep all downstairs. Luckily my brother Chris had not been working so when he saw the water rolling up the garden he took the television and video upstairs. The suite would not go up so the rims of it got soaked. We had only decorated 3 weeks before and we had to redecorate with a new carpet as well.
